dialogue: The pair walked out of the palace and towards a company ship.
Okay, looks like you're starting off with quite the task.
The trip to Prohibre is a long one.
You'll be flying the platoon ship. It shouldn't be too
different from what you're used to in terms of handling.
Yes, understood Ms. Tequia. Just one question.
What exactly will I be doing besides flying to the planet.
The Empire has bases hidden on most planets nowadays.
So for now you'll just drop off the troops at one of them.
The two of us will stay at the base, while
the rest of the army will advance on the enemy.
The enemy's forces aren't expected to be too significant,
so the captains of each squad should be able to handle it.
Later on, you might be expected to pilot the ship into battle
to take retreating troops, or to relocate them to
other parts of the battlefield to stage attacks.
But that shouldn't be the case for this mission.
Leave future jobs for your future self.
Are you ready to fly to Prohibre?
